hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ASSIGNMENT_ID, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FROM_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS TO_DATE, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PERSON_ID, BILLING_ORGANISATION_ID, EU_ORGANISATION_ID, APPROVED_EXPENSES, ASG_ACTIVE, TO_CHAR(ASSIGNMENT_END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS ASSIGNMENT_END_DATE, ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(ASSIGNMENT_START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS ASSIGNMENT_START_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE9, AUTOMATIC_INVOICE, BASIC_SALARY, BILLING_CODE, BILLING_CODE_ID, BILLING_ORGANISATION_PERSON_ID, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, COMMENTS, COST_CENTRE, CREATED_AS, DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_1, DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_2, DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_3, DELIVERABLES_APPR_NOTI_TO_ID, DELIVERABLES_APPR_NOTI_TO_ORG, DELIVERABLES_NAME, ELEMENT_1, ELEMENT_2, ELEMENT_3, ELEMENT_4, ELEMENT_5, ENGAGEMENT_CONTRACT_TYPE, EQUIPMENT_DETAILS, EQUIPMENT_REQUIRED_YN, ETS_APPROVAL_NOTIFICATION_TO, ETS_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_2, EU_CONTACT_PERSON_ID, EXPENSE_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_ID, EXPENSE_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_ORG, EXPENSE_APPROVER_1, EXPENSE_APPROVER_2, EXPENSE_APPROVER_3, EXPENSE_NAME, GST_EXEMPT, INVOICE_RECIPIENT_EMAIL, IS_BULK_APPROVAL, IS_BULK_APPROVAL_DELIVERABLES, IS_BULK_APPROVAL_EXPENSE, IS_DAILY, IS_START_END_TIME, JOB_TITLE, MODERN_AWARD_DESCRIPTION, MODERN_AWARD_ID, PAYROLL_NOTES, PAYSLIP_EMAIL, PAY_ARRANGEMENT, PAY_METHOD_ID, PREFERRED, PRT_STATUS, RATE, RATE1, RATE2, RATE3, RATE4, RATE5, REFERENCE_A_PO, REFERENCE_B, REFERENCE_C, REFERENCE_D, REFERENCE_NO_1, REFERENCE_NO_2, REFERENCE_NO_3, RESTRAINT_OF_TRADE, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, SPECIAL_CONDITIONS, TERMINATION_NOTICE, TERMINATION_NOTICE_UNIT, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_ID, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_RATE_HIDDEN, TIMECARD_LAYOUT, TIMECARD_REQUIRED, TIMECARD_SECONDARY_APPROVAL_ID, TIMECARD_TERTIARY_APPROVAL_ID, TIMESHEET_NAME, TIMESHEET_UNITS, UNIT, USE_AWARD_CALCULATION, USE_DELIVERABLES, USE_EXPENSE, WC_ORGANISATION_TYPE_FLAG, WC_ORG_CODE_RATE_LINK_ID, WORKING_STATE, WORK_END_TIME, WORK_START_TIME FROM HP_ASSIGNMENTS_D WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO HP_ASSIGNMENTS_D ( ASSIGNMENT_ID, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PERSON_ID, BILLING_ORGANISATION_ID, EU_ORGANISATION_ID, APPROVED_EXPENSES, ASG_ACTIVE, ASSIGNMENT_END_DATE, ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER, ASSIGNMENT_START_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE9, AUTOMATIC_INVOICE, BASIC_SALARY, BILLING_CODE, BILLING_CODE_ID, EXPENSE_NAME, GST_EXEMPT, INVOICE_RECIPIENT_EMAIL, IS_BULK_APPROVAL, IS_BULK_APPROVAL_DELIVERABLES, IS_BULK_APPROVAL_EXPENSE, IS_DAILY, IS_START_END_TIME, JOB_TITLE, MODERN_AWARD_DESCRIPTION, MODERN_AWARD_ID, PAYROLL_NOTES, PAYSLIP_EMAIL, PAY_ARRANGEMENT, PAY_METHOD_ID, PREFERRED, PRT_STATUS, RATE, RATE1, RATE2, RATE3, RATE4, RATE5, REFERENCE_A_PO, REFERENCE_B, REFERENCE_C, REFERENCE_D, REFERENCE_NO_1, REFERENCE_NO_2, REFERENCE_NO_3, RESTRAINT_OF_TRADE, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, SPECIAL_CONDITIONS, TERMINATION_NOTICE, TERMINATION_NOTICE_UNIT, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_ID, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_RATE_HIDDEN, TIMECARD_LAYOUT, TIMECARD_REQUIRED, TIMECARD_SECONDARY_APPROVAL_ID, TIMECARD_TERTIARY_APPROVAL_ID, TIMESHEET_NAME, TIMESHEET_UNITS, UNIT, USE_AWARD_CALCULATION, USE_DELIVERABLES, USE_EXPENSE, WC_ORGANISATION_TYPE_FLAG, WC_ORG_CODE_RATE_LINK_ID, WORKING_STATE, WORK_END_TIME, WORK_START_TIME ) VALUES ( ${ASSIGNMENT_ID}, ${FROM_DATE}, ${TO_DATE}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${PERSON_ID}, ${BILLING_ORGANISATION_ID}, ${EU_ORGANISATION_ID}, ${APPROVED_EXPENSES}, ${ASG_ACTIVE}, ${ASSIGNMENT_END_DATE}, ${ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER}, ${ASSIGNMENT_START_DATE}, ${ATTRIBUTE1}, ${ATTRIBUTE10}, ${ATTRIBUTE9}, ${AUTOMATIC_INVOICE}, ${BASIC_SALARY}, ${BILLING_CODE}, ${BILLING_CODE_ID}, ${BILLING_ORGANISATION_PERSON_ID}, ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, ${COMMENTS}, ${COST_CENTRE}, ${CREATED_AS}, ${DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_1}, ${DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_2}, ${DELIVERABLES_APPROVER_3}, ${DELIVERABLES_APPR_NOTI_TO_ID}, ${DELIVERABLES_APPR_NOTI_TO_ORG}, ${DELIVERABLES_NAME}, ${ELEMENT_1}, ${ELEMENT_2}, ${ELEMENT_3}, ${ELEMENT_4}, ${ELEMENT_5}, ${ENGAGEMENT_CONTRACT_TYPE}, ${EQUIPMENT_DETAILS}, ${EQUIPMENT_REQUIRED_YN}, ${ETS_APPROVAL_NOTIFICATION_TO}, ${ETS_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_2}, ${EU_CONTACT_PERSON_ID}, ${EXPENSE_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_ID}, ${EXPENSE_APPROVAL_NOTI_TO_ORG}, ${EXPENSE_APPROVER_1}, ${EXPENSE_APPROVER_2}, ${EXPENSE_APPROVER_3}, ${EXPENSE_NAME}, ${GST_EXEMPT}, ${INVOICE_RECIPIENT_EMAIL}, ${IS_BULK_APPROVAL}, ${IS_BULK_APPROVAL_DELIVERABLES}, ${REFERENCE_NO_3}, ${RESTRAINT_OF_TRADE}, ${SERVICE_DESCRIPTION}, ${SPECIAL_CONDITIONS}, ${TERMINATION_NOTICE}, ${TERMINATION_NOTICE_UNIT}, ${TIMECARD_APPROVAL_ID}, ${TIMECARD_APPROVAL_RATE_HIDDEN}, ${TIMECARD_LAYOUT}, ${TIMECARD_REQUIRED}, ${TIMECARD_SECONDARY_APPROVAL_ID}, ${TIMECARD_TERTIARY_APPROVAL_ID}, ${TIMESHEET_NAME}, ${TIMESHEET_UNITS}, ${UNIT}, ${USE_AWARD_CALCULATION}, ${USE_DELIVERABLES}, ${USE_EXPENSE}, ${WC_ORGANISATION_TYPE_FLAG}, ${WC_ORG_CODE_RATE_LINK_ID}, ${WORKING_STATE}, ${WORK_END_TIME}, ${WORK_START_TIME} )

UPDATE HP_ASSIGNMENTS_D SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID}, TERMINATION_NOTICE = ${TERMINATION_NOTICE}, TERMINATION_NOTICE_UNIT = ${TERMINATION_NOTICE_UNIT}, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_ID = ${TIMECARD_APPROVAL_ID}, TIMECARD_APPROVAL_RATE_HIDDEN =
